meanings.definition: In a thoughtless or careless manner
meanings.sent1: She mindlessly scrolled through her phone without paying attention.
meanings.sent2: He walked mindlessly down the street, lost in his own thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The cat mindlessly knocked over the vase while chasing a toy.
meanings.sent4: The wind mindlessly scattered the leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent5: The student mindlessly doodled in the margins of the notebook during class.

meanings.sent1: They mindlessly agreed to the plan without fully understanding it.
meanings.sent2: She mindlessly ate the cookies without realizing they were for a special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The robot mindlessly followed its programming, unaware of the chaos it caused.
meanings.sent4: The river mindlessly flowed downstream, oblivious to the changes around it.
meanings.sent5: The child mindlessly skipped along the path, lost in imagination.

meanings.sent1: The mindlessly wandering ghost was said to haunt the old mansion.
meanings.sent2: The mindlessly staring cat seemed to be in a trance.
meanings.sent3: The mindlessly spinning wheel on the bike made it hard to control.
meanings.sent4: The mindlessly chattering crowd drowned out all other sounds.
meanings.sent5: The mindlessly blinking light in the distance was mesmerizing.
